quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: The only limit is your doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King

quote: Happiness is the key to success.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Hardships prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Everything you need is within you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas A. Edison
